rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0001
rows.name: Lu-san knows Nopon, meh!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0002
rows.name:
Yes. They often buy the art pieces
that I make.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0003
rows.name: As the old saying goes, they're what you'd call "easy marks".[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0004
rows.name: Don't you call those "valued customers"?

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0005
rows.name: You said you've lived on this planet a long time?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0006
rows.name: Yes. It's a quiet, nice planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0007
rows.name:
The animals and insects are all
docile and good-natured creatures.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: xs04070100_SEL0011
rows.name: Nod vaguely.

rows.label: xs04070100_JNK0020
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: xs04070100_SEL0021
rows.name: Interject that you've been attacked many times.

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0008
rows.name: Huh? We've been attacked loads of times![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0009
rows.name: That's right, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0010
rows.name:
If Tatsu wasn't here, you'd all be
food by now, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0011
rows.name:
Right. If we're attacked next time,
we have bait to offer up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0012
rows.name:
That's just because
they were hungry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0013
rows.name: Not docile at all, then[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0014
rows.name: It's just[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0015
rows.name: Just...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0016
rows.name: Recently, noisy groups keep showing up one after another on this planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0017
rows.name:
Ah, I don't mean you.
I mean the Bias, and groups like them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0018
rows.name: Lu-san, do you hate the Bias?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0019
rows.name: Absolutely[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0019_2
rows.name:
They're the hateful bunch
who destroyed my peaceful life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0020
rows.name: As the old saying goes, we're sworn enemies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0021
rows.name:
Lu, you seem
quite knowledgeable about Earth's language.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0022
rows.name: Well...yeah. Most of the time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0023
rows.name:
Actually, inside what looks like the wreckage
of a spaceship up ahead,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0024
rows.name: I found something called a data [System:Ruby rt=Device ]terminal[/System:Ruby].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0025
rows.name:
That satisfies the spring
of my intellectual curiosity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0026
rows.name:
"Up ahead"... you mean
the Life Point?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0027
rows.name: Seems like it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0027_2
rows.name: Lu, if you don't mind, could you lend us that [System:Ruby rt=Device ]terminal[/System:Ruby]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0028
rows.name: Of course, of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0029
rows.name:
Thanks.
Lin, try analyzing this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0030
rows.name: Okay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0031
rows.name: Got the results. Looks like book data.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0032
rows.name: Let me see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0033
rows.name:
I see. What's up ahead is part of the Life;
it's likely the Database Unit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0034
rows.name: Then it's not the main Life core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0035
rows.name:
It broke into so many pieces
when it fell,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0036
rows.name:
if we found them together,
it would probably be a miracle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0037
rows.name: I see[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0038
rows.name: Lin, no need to get down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0039
rows.name:
Even if it's just the Database unit and not the core,
that's still an important part of humanity's heritage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0040
rows.name: Anyway, let's check it out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0041
rows.name: Right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0042
rows.name: Better not go now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0043
rows.name: Why's that, meh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0044
rows.name: I was near the wreckage until just a moment ago, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0045
rows.name:
those hateful Bias people appeared,
so I came back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0046
rows.name: The Bias...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0047
rows.name: Elma-san, I have a bad feeling![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0048
rows.name: Right. Let's hurry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0049
rows.name:
To me,
 you are already folks who could be called friends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0050
rows.name:
I shall accompany you as well.
This is what the old saying calls 'too many heads are better than none'[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0051
rows.name: Still getting it wrong[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]
